nodes.text: Kourterel was a male individual who served as a lieutenant in the Galactic Empire. He had a child and a family on Vanzeist. In 3 ABY, Prelate Verge, a member of the Imperial Ruling Council, asked after the child. He further promised Kourterel, aboard the prelate's Imperial II-class Star Destroyer the Herald, that a detail of stormtroopers would oversee the protection his family from rebels. Captain Tabor Seitaron, an officer who taught military history at Carida Academy, later recollected Verge's promise to Kourterel when overviewing Verge's personality based on their time together.
Kourterel was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
